thread.section_title: Right Channel Radios Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Right Channel Radios | www.rightchannelradios.com
thread.title: Tom Roberts
thread.title_full: Right Channel Radios reviewed by Tom Roberts

author: Tom Roberts
title: Tom Roberts
text:
Hi Everyone. My Microphone and adapters were shipped to NewZealand on March 15th, arrived at my address 24th in person.
The modulation wouldn't work, so after being in touch with Right Radios, a friend here, can change a wire, or he, might change the 4 pin plug to a 5 pin, and I will return the adapters.
Thankyou Right Radios, later I will probably purchase a good swr meter
Regards
Tom Roberts
Christchurch NZ
